title: Google\Cloud\Run\V2\ListRevisionsRequest
name: ListRevisionsRequest
description:
Request message for retrieving a list of Revisions.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.run.v2.ListRevisionsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The Service from which the Revisions should be listed. To list all Revisions across Services, use "-" instead of Service name. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/services/{service}

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: Maximum number of revisions to return in this call.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: A page token received from a previous call to ListRevisions. All other parameters must match.

params.name: data.show_deleted
params.description: If true, returns deleted (but unexpired) resources along with active ones.
